description: Front-line workers on the Isle of Man can request weekly Covid-19 tests, the health minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Weekly tests made available to Manx front-line staff
title_page: Coronavirus: Weekly tests made available to Manx front-line staff - BBC News
maintext: Despite the slowdown of the spread of the disease on the island, the virus was still "going to be around for quite a long time", he added.
